metadata.title: Robust device evaluation environment for improved sensitivity

sections.content:
Question:
Has the development environment for the Capacotove Touch Sensor been prepared?
Answer:
Use QE for Capacitive Touch as a support tool for developing a modern capacitive touch sensor.
QE for Capacitive Touch can be downloaded from URL below.
https://www.renesas.com/qe-capacitive-touch
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
